Html:
Does anyone have any experience using Subsonic in VWD? I/ve been using it to develop and like the simplicicty. I'd like to move forward with the development of the CSK using VWD.

rhhanson

I don't recommend it. Try getting standard ed.

http://www.learn2asp.net/
Zach, When do you expect the first build useable in VWD?

Yea. What I am going to do for the releases is take the generated folder from the ClubStarterKit.Data project and put it into the web project. The reason I didn't do that already is because I really like a binary rather than a lot of code files in an App_Code directory. So, yes, it will be optimized for VWD.
